DOC.brief_summary: To collect additional data relate safety indicator efficacy patient participate 1160.113 study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Completed study 1160.113 per protocol 2 . Continuing need anticoagulation Exclusion criterion : 1. uncontrolled hypertension 2. severe renal impairment 3. active liver disease 4. increase risk bleeding
